content.text:
# Bhola Maheswar

Bhola Maheswar is a mythological serial broadcast by Sananda TV. It's a lord Shiva saga. The saga is primarily focused on Lord Shiva (Jeetu Kamal) and Parvati (Jasmine Roy).
Cast
* Jeetu Kamal (Bhola Maheswar)
* Jasmine Roy (Parvati)
* Suman Kundu (Vishnu)
